title: who is a good singed counter? (besides vayne or nasus)
body: I have played many games as singed, many against so called singed counters but I have never really been shutdown that well by anyone except for maybe jayce and darius (and vayne of course). even ranged champs like teemo if I farm under tower and even lose cs i just go ham @ 6 and usually win and free farm. maybe I'm just stomping bad teemo's/kennen's, or they just don't expect me to go ham on them at 6.

replies.body:
Singed has what we call a %%%%ty laning phase because all he can do is run around and throw things so when a champion that has high burst dmg + CC to stop Singed from running around or is able to gapclose then he loses lane.

Pick something like Renek, Nid or Liss to gain an easy lead early or pick something that is more lategame based and focus on getting as much farm as possible (Nasus and Tryn).
melee champs you can just fling them into tower but liss sounds like a nice counter. since she gets free spells with her passive and build tankier with rod of ages.

Well 2 options vs Singed when under his tower as a melee.
1. Attack him when he goes for minions that are at max tower range then walk away so that even if you get flung the tower won't agro.
2. Proxy/Roam/Invade
thnx for free farm while a ping mia.
Enjoy your farm while I head off to mid lane with the jungler and 3 man take 2 mid towers and drag then I'll just casually base and tp back to top after you've done about 200 dmg to the tower.
i got tele too and you won't take any mid towers against any mid with good waveclear.

Mids with good waveclear usually don't have any escapes so it's either let the tower go, try to hold it 3v1 and get dived or you TP in then we'll go fight over drag and win since early game Singed = garbage. Don't forget that you were pushed in at top so you'll lose heaps of cs by leaving lane + after all the fighting is done atleast 2 waves will be stacked and ready to be denied by your tower after I TP top and push it in.
well it'll be 3v2 with the jungler, but yeah it they could lose the tower but usually they won't if it is that early in the game

Azir, Basiclly play like u normally do with him and u rek
Cause of azir slow and no need to chase
never played against an azir as singed but I would agree that it would be a very difficult lane as he has alot of poke. but realistically he has mana problems early so idk.

Olaf. He chases you because he doesnt care, the lower he gets the more damage he does LOL
Reketon can do well too. Nidalee can destroy him.

In lanes when you get destroyed you can just go proxy mode anyway and it doesnt matter all that much. Singed is a unique champion.

olaf does great damage that by-passes defences, but the problem with him is that you can kite hit around and if you dodge a single axe he can't even get near you. although nidalee was scary before her nerf you can usually just hide behind minions and fling her into tower range if she tried to chunk you with cougar.

most ranged champs i come across, I just all in them at lvl 6 and they usually have to flash. even quinn (funny because you can fling her mid dash). even teemo (unless i let him create a death field of shrooms).
You're stomping bad players and players that aren't necessarily bad they just don't know what to do against Singed.
Yeah it doesn't really matter, singed could 0-13 and still be relevant mid to late
